name: DIGITAL RIGHT TO REPAIR ASSOCIATION DBA RIGHT TO REPAIR
description: The organization advocates for repair-friendly policies, regulations, and statutes.
sampleDescriptions: Copyright reform legislation to allow circumvention of copyright protection in order to repair equipment, including sale and trafficking of repair tools (Freedom to Repair Act, HR 6566).
Copyright Act (Section 1201); Freedom to Repair Act. H.R.6566
